THREE NAMES YOU GO BY:
1. Brandon
2. House
3. Leaf

THREE SCREEN NAMES YOU HAVE:
1. xcradleofpainx
2. xcradleofpaynex
3. n/a

THREE THINGS YOU LIKE ABOUT YOURSELF:
1. Im smart
2. lots of friends
3. My ability to deal with stress

THREE THINGS YOU DON'T LIKE ABOUT YOURSELF:
1. Shit I have to deal with
2. Care too much sometimes
3. not sure

THREE THINGS THAT SCARE YOU:
1. losing friends
2. when in deadly situations(like ive been in)
3. I scare myself... I dont know my own strength

THREE OF YOUR EVERYDAY ESSENTIALS:
1. Cigs
2. weed
3. friends

THREE THINGS YOU ARE WEARING RIGHT NOW:
1. black pants
2. red shirt
3. my hairtie thingie

THREE OF YOUR FAVORITE BANDS (or artists (at the moment)):
1. SlipKnoT
2. Insane Clown Posse
3. Mudvayne

THREE OF YOUR FAVORITE SONGS AT PRESENT:
1. Mudvayne - Fucking determined
2. Three Six Mafia - Stay Fly
3. Slayer - Bloodline

THREE NEW THINGS YOU WANT TO DO IN THE NEXT 12 MONTHS:
1. Job
2. Stay with Megan
3. Save up some money

THREE THINGS YOU WANT IN A RELATIONSHIP (love is a given):
1. Get serious and commit myself to her
2. Get her parents to like me so I can be with her
3. To say fuck u to all who talk shit about me behind my back 


TWO TRUTHS AND A LIE
1. I love Megan
2. Im high 
3. Im sleeping?


THREE PHYSICAL THINGS ABOUT THE OPPOSITE SEX (or same) THAT APPEAL TO YOU:
1. Face
2. tits
3. ass

THREE THINGS YOU JUST CAN'T DO:
1. Cheat on anyone
2. go a day without a cig
3. get along with parents

THREE THINGS YOU CAN DO:
1. Roll
2. stand up for my friends and my girl especially
3. Help people

THREE OF YOUR FAVORITE HOBBIES:
1. Girlfriend
2. music
3. smoke

THREE THINGS YOU WANT TO DO REALLY BADLY RIGHT NOW:
1. sleep
2. Beat Justins ass for sayin shit to my girl
3. fuck


THREE CAREERS YOU'RE CONSIDERING:
1. Computers
2. Maybe like a bouncer or somethin... shit thatd be cool
3. not sure

THREE PLACES YOU WANT TO GO ON VACATION:
1. Busch Gardens and that area
2. California
3. A motel or somethin with Megan

THREE KID'S NAMES:
1. Nikita
2. Not sure on boy name yet
3. Talena(another girl name)

THREE THINGS YOU WANT TO DO BEFORE YOU DIE:
1. Get married
2. have kids
3. Raise my kids 

THREE PEOPLE WHO MUST TAKE THIS NOW OR DIE:
1. i
2. don't
3. care

Well its been a long time since an update once again. Im workin now, ok pay I suppose, easy as hell work. Had alotta shit goin on and im gettin rid of all the bullshit in my life. Been smokin alot again lately, and wont be too long till I get a large amount...and get FUCKED up. Everyday for like 2 weeks...all day pretty much. God I cant wait. I also cant wait to get my hands on a few people, I am dead serious if I get ahold of em im goin to jail, not juvi, ill be goin straight to juvi because imma FUCK some people up. Have mercy on any of the 5-7 im goin after. Im out, later.
http://xcradleofpaynex.livejournal.com/2992.html

Well its been a long time, time for an update. Well me and Emily have been arguin alot lately over some stupid bullshit. She thinks im mad/upset over us not doin shit. I dont care... its a long stury but to cut it short, shes usin maggot and his family for a place to stay, cigarettes, rides to wherever, and etc. She was asked to help clean occasionally and she cant even do that and it pisses me off when were all bustin our ass cleaning and shes on the computer playin fuckin games. I love her to fuckin death and she just pisses me off. She doesnt see it from my view. Im done dealin with it. Im sorry Emily, I love you(as a friend) and nothin can stop that, but you need to straighten the fuck up. Ive tried helping you out but you fuckin just push me away. Ill try to talk to in a week or so and let this shit settle, itd be best. Maybe we can patch shit up, just drop the past, let it be. Whatever, im sorry. But you think all this is my fault. It takes 2 to tango. Well other shit goin on besides that... been doin the same shit, different day. Go to school..come home...smoke, whatever. Well im out, I got too much stress.
http://xcradleofpaynex.livejournal.com/2805.html

Well alot has happened since I last updated. Football season for me is over, we won 7 out of 8 games...7-1. Damn good. Um... going out with a girl named Farrah now...and uh... im done with typing. Later.
http://xcradleofpaynex.livejournal.com/2471.html

1. Who are you?

2. Are we friends?

3. When and how did we meet?

4. How have I affected you?

5. What do you think of me?

6. What's the fondest memory you have of me?

7. How long do you think we will be friends?

8. Do you love me?

9. Do you have a crush on me?

10. Would you kiss me? 

11. Would you hug me?

12. Physically, what stands out?

13. Emotionally, what stands out?

14. Do you wish I was closer to you? 

15. On a scale of 1-10, how hott am I? 

16. Give me a nickname and explain why you picked it. 

17. Am I lovable? 

18. How long have you known me?

19. Describe me in one word. 

20. What was your first impression? 

21. Do you still think that way about me now? 

22. What do you think my weakness is? 

23. Do you think I'll get married?

32. Do you think our friendship is getting stronger, weaker, or staying the same? 

33. Do you feel that you could talk to me about anything and I would listen?

34. Are you going to put this on your LJ and see what I say about you?

Thursday I wrote a paper of previous suicide attempts. My teacher turned it into my counselor, who pulled me out of class, and called my parents and etc. So I got home... thought nothin of it. Come 9:30-10:00.... People show up at my house, told me to pack some stuff, and get into the van... I got baker acted...AGAIN! Im fuckin sick of it. My parents called them and told them to come pick me up. I got back just awhile ago. Only people who know is Heather Lynn and Jessica Perry, my family, and who it was that took me. Well im not talkin to my parents, im pissed at em. Well Imma go, later.
http://xcradleofpaynex.livejournal.com/1947.html

Well today Stacy came over, spent some time together finally! We had some fun you can say. What makes me mad is I still smell her... drivin me nuts. I miss her already. I love her so much. Id do anything for her. Tomorrow Cowboys and Dolphins play...Dolphins are undefeated but they never played us. I predict Cowboys win. Well ive slowed down on smoking for Stacy, and I may be moving to Lake Gibson area... I think 2-3 people would miss me sorta.  Well gotta go, later.
http://xcradleofpaynex.livejournal.com/1623.html

Well yesterday I went to the teen rock fest with Stacy. I watched my old team, Cowboys play. They won....ok dominated. The only band any good was Endless....kick ass band. I almost got arrest, kicked in the balls, seen a car chase, there was a big...big fight at duff during a game(packers and jaguars). I was with Stacy mostly... I love Stacy..lol. I seen Caitlin...I wrestled her a few times and kicked her ass. I ran over some other girl, and etc. Kool but weird night. Well ill let yall go since im so boring.... Later.
http://xcradleofpaynex.livejournal.com/1371.html

Last saturday I went to pep boys with Caitlin and seen some concert with her... not too bad. Death After Texas(local... im friends with the band mostly) was real good. Mark...the main singer/lead guitarist was real good. Hes one of my friends... I got him 3rd period....we always mess around with each other.... raggin on each other and whatever. I have had a fairly bad week due to mom/dad/brother, and a bunch of other shit.... im sick of it and I also have found out my friend Michael has gotten a huge sack of vicadin/xanex... about 300 of each. I only took about 10 of each...imagine what that would do. Well g2g...later.
http://xcradleofpaynex.livejournal.com/1124.html

Well today was ok... I was with Stacy all day in her advisory. Today was Freshman skip day(legal skip....due to  FCAT). Well I went to get out of home, and see Stacy. My parents have officially pissed me off... its a long story and I dont feel like explaining. Just has to do with unfair treatment upon me and Brett. Hes being treated way better than I am. Well imma go before I start rambling. Hi to all my friends, I love you Stacy, I love all my friends.... but I love Stacy in a different way... heh. Night people... later.
http://xcradleofpaynex.livejournal.com/1022.html

Well here I am on my SECOND entry! Wow.... oo....weee. Ok ive lost it. Well today was rather.... ehh.... ok. I woke up late, mom took me to school. 1st period was boring kinda....personal fitness. Was in gym all day. Then advisory was normal...second period aggravating. Third period was kool. I played Mr Mikell is chess...once again, 2 times. I won once, he won once. The one where he won, he got lucky. 4th period was annoying as normal...more fuckin work!!! Only reason why I stay in her class is Stacy. She sits next to me which is also good. On Monday when were gonna be in advisory all day watchin movies, ill be with her. Well I gotta go...later people.
http://xcradleofpaynex.livejournal.com/535.html
Well, Kayla convinced me to get livejournal, and here I am. Well I gotta go, parents are being bitchy today, later.
http://xcradleofpaynex.livejournal.com/302.html
